result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
10:28 AM Defendant NOEL NMI DIEPPA in court.  Attorney Robert Allen Thorson in court for NOEL NMI DIEPPA.  Prosecuting attorney Sheila M. Yohnk in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Offer received. Attorney Thorson working on obtaining records. Bond continued.
Review hearing scheduled for January 17, 2023 at 11:00 am.
copy mailed to defendant
Bond mailed for signature.

11:39 AM Defendant NOEL NMI DIEPPA in court.  Prosecuting attorney Roy La Barton Gay in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Robert Allen Thorson in court for NOEL NMI DIEPPA. 
Attorney waives reading of complaints in 22CT90 & 22CF365. 
Defendant is informed of charges. 
Defendant received copy of Criminal Complaint.
Review hearing scheduled for November 2, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 29, 2022 at 10:00 am.

CASH BOND COVERS 22CT90 & 22CF365
Defendant is ordered to report to pretrial monitoring immediately after court and must comply with pretrial monitoring conditions.
Defendant shall not possess or consume alcoholic beverages
Defendant shall not go on any premises where primary purpose is the sale of alcohol.
Defendant shall not possess any drug paraphernalia / syringes unless medically required.
Defendant shall not possess or consume illegal drugs / any prescription drugs not prescribed.
No verbal or physical abuse of anyone.
No contact with Victim or Victim's residence.
Not to drive w/o a valid driver's license. 
Not to drive with any alcohol in system.
